Song.title: I Come By the Blood
Song.copyright: Words and music by Steve and Vikki Cook. Â© 1994 Sovereign Grace Worship (ASCAP)/Word Music

Arrangement.text:
Verse 1: [G]You are the p[A/G]erfect and r[G]ighteous [A/G]God Whose p[Bb]resence [C]bears no s[Gsus]in [G] [G]You bid me c[A/G]ome to Your h[G]oly p[A/G]lace How c[Bb]an I e[C]nter [Dsus]in [D] When Your p[Bb]resence [C]bears no s[Dsus]in? [D] Through H[Em]im, who poured out His l[C7]ife for me The at[D]oning Lamb of G[Asus]od [A] Through H[Em7]im, and His work al[C2]one I boldly [F]co[F/E]me [Dsus]
Chorus: I c[D]ome by the b[C]lood, I come by the c[G/B]ross Where Your mercy f[Am]lows from [G]hands pierced for [D/F#]me For [D]I dare not s[C]tand on my righteousn[Em]ess My every hope r[Fmaj7]ests on w[Em]hat Christ has d[Dsus]one And I c[D]ome by the b[G]lood
Verse 2: [G]You are the h[A/G]igh and ex[G]alted K[A/G]ing The O[Bb]ne the [C]angels f[Gsus]ear [G] [G]So far ab[A/G]ove me in e[G]very w[A/G]ay Lord, h[Bb]ow can [C]I draw n[Dsus]ear [D] To the O[Bb]ne the a[C]ngels f[Dsus]ear? [D] Through H[Em]im who laid down His l[C7]ife for me And asc[D]ended to Your s[Asus]ide [A] Through H[Em7]im, through Jesus al[C2]one I boldly [F]co[F/E]me [Dsus]
Arrangement.searchtext: verse 1 you are the perfect and righteous god whose presence bears no sin you bid me come to your holy place how can i enter in when your presence bears no sin through him who poured out his life for me the atoning lamb of god through him and his work alone i boldly come chorus i come by the blood i come by the cross where your mercy flows from hands pierced for me for i dare not stand on my righteousness my every hope rests on what christ has done and i come by the blood verse 2 you are the high and exalted king the one the angels fear so far above me in every way lord how can i draw near to the one the angels fear through him who laid down his life for me and ascended to your side through him through jesus alone i boldly come
Arrangement.album: Songs for the Cross Centered Life
